name: GollyJer's Mint.com Cleaner
description: Removes all ads from mint.com, including inline transaction ads.
additional_info:
09-06-2016: Updated for the move from mint.com to mint.intuit.com.
09-23-2016: Removed some identifiers no longer used in the mint source code and added WelcomeMatView to get rid of the giant top bar they now use.
10-09-2017: Updated to reflect recent changes to mint.  No longer hides items in the Overview tab that can be hidden by clicking the settings icon.
02-01-2018: Removed a new ad at the top of the Overview tab and another inline one the Transactions list.
05-21-2019: Removed a new ad at the top of the Transactions tab.
